text: ( Source : HRW - Human Rights Watch ) Internally displaced people at Centre Jean XXIII in Bangui , most of whom fled violence in Sara quarter on September 26 , 2015 . © 2015 Anthony Fouchard ( Nairobi ) – Five days of sectarian violence that
